decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This permission shall have the effect of varying condition numbered 1 on application reference P/0241/18, allowed on appeal APP/M5450/W/18/3212145 dated 10/04/19

The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of planning permission P/0241/18, allowed at appeal dated 10/04/2019.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990

Condition : 2 - This permission shall have the effect of varying condition numbered 2 on application reference P/0241/18, allowed on appeal APP/M5450/W/18/3212145 dated 10/04/19

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: 

Drawings Carried Forward from P/0241/18:

3939/002 (Block Plan), 3939/003 (Ground Floor Plan As Existing), 3939/004 (First Floor As Existing), 3939/005 (Roof Plan As Existing), 3939/006 (Front Elevation As Existing), 3939/007 (Rear Elevation As Existing), 3939/008 (Side A Elevation As Existing), 3939/009 (Side B As Existing), 3939/010 Photos Sheet 1, 3939/012 Rev. A (Overall Front Elevation As Existing), 3939/013 Rev. A (Overall Side Elevation As Existing - No Fence Shown), 3939/014 Rev. A (Overall Side Elevation As Existing - With Fence), 3939/030 Rev. A (Bin Store As Proposed), 3939/018 Rev. B (Roof Plan As Proposed), 3939/025 Rev. B (First Floor As Proposed House A), 3939/028 Rev. A (First Floor As Proposed House B), 3939/30 Rev. B (Section AA As Proposed), 3939/32 Rev. A (Section BB As Proposed).

Drawings Carried Forward from P/3169/19:

3939/016 Rev. C (Overall First Floor As Proposed), 3939/017 Rev. C (Second/Loft Level As Proposed), 3939/019 Rev. C (Overall Front Elevation As Proposed), 3939/020 Rev. C, 3939/024 Rev. C (Ground Floor As Proposed House A), 3939/026 Rev. C (Second/Loft Level As Proposed House A), 3939/029 Rev. C (Second/Loft Level As Proposed House B), 3939/022 Rev. D (Rear Elevation As Proposed) 

Drawings Proposed Under this Variation of Conditions Application:

3939/001 Rev. E (Site Location Plan), 3939/002 Rev. X (Overall Ground Floor Plan As Proposed), 3939/003 Rev. X (Overall Side Elevation As Proposed), 3939/004 Rev. X (Overall Side Elevation As Proposed), 3939/005 Rev. X (Large Scale Front Elevation As Proposed), 3939/006 Rev. X (Front Paving Detail).

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials used in the construction of the building, the ground surfacing and the boundary treatment shall be carried out in accordance with details provided pursuant to the discharge of Condition 3 under application P/2681/21. 

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The development hereby permitted shall be constructed in accordance with the Construction Method Statement Version 2, submitted pursuant to the discharge of Condition 4 under application P/2681/21. 

REASON: To ensure that measures are put in place to manage and reduce noise and vibration impacts during demolition and construction and to safeguard the amenity of neighbouring occupiers, and to ensure that the transport network impact of demolition and construction work associated with the development is managed. To ensure that measures are agreed and in place to manage and reduce dust, noise and vibration during the demolition and construction phases of the development and manage transport impacts during the demolition and construction phases of the development.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any Order revoking or re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no development shall take place under Schedule 2 Part 1 Class E and Schedule 2 Part 3 Class L.

REASON: To enable the Local Planning Authority to fully consider the effects of development normally permitted by the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 to maintain mixed, balanced, sustainable and inclusive communities and in the interests of residential and visual amenity in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies 2013, Policy CS1(B) of the Harrow Core Strategy 2012, Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and the Core Planning Principles of the National Planning Policy Framework 2021.
description: Variation Of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) Attached To Planning Permission P/0241/18 Allowed On Appeal Reference App/M5450/W/18/3212145 Dated 10/04/19 To allow alterations to front and rear garden layout, new front crossover, alterations to boundary treatment, and revised car parking arrangements.
